name: muzmatch
slogan: The world's biggest Muslim Dating app
description:
We're changing the way

Muslims find love. Come and join us!

We're a fast growing Consumer Tech startup based in London with a passionate vision to transform how Muslims find love. We recently closed a $7M Series A, are backed by Silicon Valley based Y Combinator, and are growing faster than ever. Come and join our fast growing team and work on an amazing product that's changing the world.

jobs.title: Digital Performance Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
We're looking for

We are currently looking for an enthusiastic, forward-thinking and data-driven digital performance marketing manager to join us and help us grow the business further.
You will need to be hands-on and operative from day one, as well as having strong analytical skills.
muzmatch is in the process of reshaping its digital marketing effort so the person will be responsible for taking our current digital marketing processes and lifting it up to the next level using data and experimentation.
Execution

Setup and manage campaigns across various platforms: Google, Facebook, and other necessary platforms you may want to use.
Work alongside in house creatives to spec high performance ad assets
Optimise campaigns with data scientists in order to improve performance continuously.
Work closely with our creative team to generate assets that iteratively improve our conversion rates
Work closely with our product team to deliver high quality traffic to App Store listings.
Plan and implement A/B tests in order to understand what works best.
Automate tasks that are recurring in order to ensure efficiency within the team as activity scales.
Strategy

Define our channel strategy for user acquisition including (but not limited to) UAC, paid social, display, video and programmatic.
Build clear presentations in order to communicate the acquisition strategy for a wide range of stakeholders, both upwards and downwards.
Create and maintain a 'Best Practices' knowledge bank that can be applied to new market launches, new campaigns etc.
Seek to track organic reach of all aspects of the business and add value in terms of boosting this
Data Confidence

Coordinate the implementation of tracking and ensure its integrity with engineering teams.
Work closely with the data science team in order to build accurate and well organised reporting.
Ability to clearly communicate to wider team findings from experiments.
Requirements

3+ years experience in a performance manager role (agency or client-side), ideally with a focus on mobile acquisition
You have a strong technical understanding (i.e. you know how things work in the background), good analytical skills and always look into improving processes (e.g. automation of reporting, marketing activity etc)
Strong understanding and previous experience using SQL.
In-depth knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager and Google Ads (UAC campaigns a plus)
Good understanding of the online advertising ecosystem and how tracking works - both web and mobile.
Good project management and communication skills. You will need to work with multiple stakeholders, both internal and external
Eager to learn, you'll bring passion and expertise to the exciting future we are building.

We're looking for

We are currently looking for an enthusiastic, forward-thinking and data-driven digital performance marketing manager to join us and help us grow the business further.
You will need to be hands-on and operative from day one, as well as having strong analytical skills.
muzmatch is in the process of reshaping its digital marketing effort so the person will be responsible for taking our current digital marketing processes and lifting it up to the next level using data and experimentation.
Execution

Setup and manage campaigns across various platforms: Google, Facebook, and other necessary platforms you may want to use.
Work alongside in house creatives to spec high performance ad assets
Optimise campaigns with data scientists in order to improve performance continuously.
Work closely with our creative team to generate assets that iteratively improve our conversion rates
Work closely with our product team to deliver high quality traffic to App Store listings.
Plan and implement A/B tests in order to understand what works best.
Automate tasks that are recurring in order to ensure efficiency within the team as activity scales.
Strategy

Define our channel strategy for user acquisition including (but not limited to) UAC, paid social, display, video and programmatic.
Build clear presentations in order to communicate the acquisition strategy for a wide range of stakeholders, both upwards and downwards.
Create and maintain a 'Best Practices' knowledge bank that can be applied to new market launches, new campaigns etc.
Seek to track organic reach of all aspects of the business and add value in terms of boosting this
Data Confidence

Coordinate the implementation of tracking and ensure its integrity with engineering teams.
Work closely with the data science team in order to build accurate and well organised reporting.
Ability to clearly communicate to wider team findings from experiments.
Requirements

3+ years experience in a performance manager role (agency or client-side), ideally with a focus on mobile acquisition
You have a strong technical understanding (i.e. you know how things work in the background), good analytical skills and always look into improving processes (e.g. automation of reporting, marketing activity etc)
Strong understanding and previous experience using SQL.
In-depth knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager and Google Ads (UAC campaigns a plus)
Good understanding of the online advertising ecosystem and how tracking works - both web and mobile.
Good project management and communication skills. You will need to work with multiple stakeholders, both internal and external
Eager to learn, you'll bring passion and expertise to the exciting future we are building.

jobs.title: Head of Community
jobs.description:
We're looking for..

Someone who has 2+ years experience managing a customer support/community management team (ideally at a tech startup)
Someone who is very comfortable with data analysis, and are eager to implement improved processes and methods to lead the Community Management team
Someone who has excellent English literacy skills
Someone who is eternally positive and wants to help our entire community through their journey on muzmatch
Someone who is comfortable around dealing with spikes in activity and workload
Someone who takes pride in ensuring users respect the platform and other members.

It's important that you..

Are proactive and identify innovative ways to improve the user experience throughout a member’s journey on muzmatch
Can feed back enhancements and ideas for tooling to help your team do their job better
Analyse and understand incoming issues and strive towards methods to automate or optimize our support
Identify and aggregate common reported issues/bugs/feature requests/user activity trends and communicate them in a structured fashion
Be responsible for the community management business roadmap by contributing to the development and implementation of strategies and processes relating to community management team

What you'll do..

Join a 6 person strong customer support organisation that is known for great quality of service, that engages and communicates courteously with all customers through all channels, focusing on solving customers concerns quickly and efficiently (within 24hrs) making muzmatch a brand users love.
Get stuck in with customer service via emails, in-app messages, social media, and app stores
Resolve member-to-member reports
Evolve and update our existing documentation, member guidelines and moderation processes
Triage reported software issues, liaising with our QA team and being up to date with app developments and feature changes
Be data driven - work with us to enhance our reporting and tracking of workload, completion rates and throughput on a team and individual basis and report to management
Help in setting monthly/quarterly targets and ensuring our moderation team are working towards them
Understand the mechanics of muzmatch inside out - act as a subject matter expert and provide advice to other team members for more complex tasks.
Act as a technical escalation point for team members
Create and manage monthly shift rota and weekend/holiday coverage
Supporting the recruitment and training of new team members
Manage and monitor our international profile moderation team
